text:
Corinthia Hotels take home five coveted awards at the World Travel Awards 2015
Corinthia Hotels, the internationally-renowned brand of luxury hotels, won five coveted awards at the 2015 World Travel Awards, held on September 5 in Sardinia, Italy.
The five-star Corinthia Hotel Lisbon was awarded both “Europe’s Leading Green Hotel” and “Portugal’s Leading Conference Hotel,” in recognition of the hotel’s outstanding long-term energy efficiency project and its world-class business facilities and service. Corinthia Hotel Prague was named the “Czech Republic’s Leading Business Hotel,” while Corinthia Palace Hotel&Spa, Malta’s leading Grande Dame hotel, took home “Malta’s Leading Spa Resort.” The Royal Residences at Corinthia Hotel Budapest won “Hungary’s Leading Hotel Residences 2015.”
“We are proud of these awards. They represent well deserved recognition of the efforts made by our many colleagues in each of our hotels in living the spirit of Corinthia, an endeavor to fulfill our service promise and operate as craftsmen and craftswomen in the field of hospitality, with our leisure, corporate or conference guests,” said Simon Naudi, CEO of Corinthia Hotels, operator of the award-winning hotels.
Corinthia Lisbon: “Europe’s Leading Green Hotel 2015” and “Portugal’s Leading Conference Hotel 2015”With its state-of-the-art conference facilities, Corinthia Hotel Lisbon boasts the largest and best-equipped hotel conference and events center in Lisbon, with 16 rooms gathered in the same floor with natural day light and a capacity for up to 1,400 delegates in a multi-purpose 32,000 square-feet space. Sustainability is a top priority, which is why the hotel launched a ground-breaking Hotel Energy Efficiency project in recent years, comprising of tailor-made engineering solutions with state-of-the-art equipment. Today, the hotel is able to produce energy autonomously and offers very energy-efficient solutions to running large-scale events and operations.
